Ekosistem yang terdiri dari Microsoft dan Nokia mempunyai skala yang tak tertandingi di dunia, kata Stephen Elop . Expand Jeep is looking to revive its luxury Wagoneer, which will be a seven-seat SUV. Photo/ Supplied Jeep will resurrect a hallowed nameplate- the Grand Wagoneer- in two years. It's time we gave the market an upper-scale Grand Wagoneer, said Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne . "You'll see it in January 2013."
